General.Name: King Global Ventures Inc
General.Description: King Global Ventures Inc., a junior prospecting and natural-resource company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company primarily explores for gold. It holds 100% interests in the York Gold project that includes 77 claims located in northeastern Quebec; and the Gold Boulder property, which consists of four contiguous claim blocks of 100 hectares situated near the town of Glenwood in Central Newfoundland. The company was formerly known as Rosita Mining Corporation and changed its name to King Global Ventures Inc. in September 2019. King Global Ventures Inc. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
